name: Auto: Fervent Flames
description:
Your Melt and Vaporize effects are changed to deal double DMG for this instance.
Overloaded effect is changed to: DMG +6 for this instance, target is forcibly switched to the previous character.
descriptionraw: Your {SPRITE_PRESET#2101}{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Melt</color> and {SPRITE_PRESET#2103}{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Vaporize</color> effects are changed to deal double DMG for this instance.\n{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Overloaded</color> effect is changed to: DMG +6 for this instance, target is forcibly switched to the previous character.
